item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: DAL (Delta Air Lines, Inc.) Middle Strong demand and shareholder-friendly actions are boosting Delta Air Lines, although high costs and competition remain as challenges. BE (Bloom Energy Corporation) Small Despite challenges, the hydrogen industry presents attractive investment opportunities for those with a high risk tolerance and a long-term investment horizon.
